meta.title: Operation of Non Invasive Blood Pressure Apparatus

sections.purpose: To measure arterial blood pressure in conscious animals using tail-cuff or similar methods.
procedure: Acclimatize animals to the restrainer and warm environment.
Place the cuff around the tail or limb as per device design.
Start the measurement cycle and allow automatic inflation/deflation.
Record systolic (and diastolic/mean if available) pressures.
Repeat measurements and calculate average values.
Clean cuffs and restrainers after use.
precautions: Avoid using in very stressed or cold animals (affects tail blood flow).
Monitor animals to prevent escape or injury.
Use appropriate restrainers suited to species and size.
